entity.name: Aditya Raj Kaul
entity.description: Journalist reporting on Internal Security, Conflict, Foreign Affairs

text: @AdityaRajKaul The way Chinese government are going on with COVID19, leaves nothing but great room for suspicion. Disgusting to know that despite their failings in this whole issue, they go about provoking the rest of the world.
